title: Millburn High School Varsity Club Athletes of the Week
text:
Millburn High School Varsity Club Athletes of the Week October 21, 2015 Last updated: Wednesday, October 21, 2015, 3:36 PM The Item of Millburn and Short Hills Print 
The girls tennis team and squad members Stephanie Schrage, Isabella Waung and Sydney Zirlin are the recipients of Millburn High School Varsity Club Athlete of the Week honors for Oct. 12-18. 
The girls tennis team defeated Moorestown High School 4-1 Oct. 15 in the New Jersey State Interscholastic Athletic Association Group 3 Tournament final to extend its state group title streak to 10 years. 
Millburn now holds the state record for the most group tournament crowns, 21. 
Schrage, a junior, defeated Vineland High School's Tess Fisher 6-2, 6-1 Oct. 17 to join Jennifer Tuchband (1998) as the only players in team history to win the state singles title. 
Waung and Zirlin, both juniors, added to Millburn's championship haul Oct. 17 by defeating Newark Academy's Sydney Loh and Rebecca Slater 6-0, 6-1 in the finals of the state doubles tournament. 
They became the third duo in team history to hold the title of state champions, joining Emily Bary and Melissa Mann (2008) and Stephanie Chen Schmidt and Sandy Xie (2013).
